channel.title: Javascript on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti

item.title: An in-home Social Network
item.description: I was thinking about creating social networks for specific purposes, when one day I figured out it would be good to have a social network restricted to my home. I got this idea looking at my son and thinking what he would do on Facebook a few years from now. I have nothing against Facebook or any social network - I think they are all fabulous. I just think that an internet-based social network is like the world outside your home. You are not ready for it when you are very young.
